events.message: I received the wrong size for the jacket I ordered and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorised as a request for a refund due to incorrect item size delivery.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong jacket size delivery.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong jacket size. I’m here to help you with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the jacket you received to start the refund process?
Thank you. My order number is 12345678, and I have attached a photo showing the size tag is medium instead of large.
We have reviewed your information and will issue a full refund once the incorrect jacket is returned. A prepaid return label will be emailed to you shortly.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the prepaid label and will send the jacket back today.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to confirm you received the refund and everything is resolved to your satisfaction.
We are closing this case now. Please let us know if you need any further assistance in the future.
